titles: A congratulatory poem upon the arrival of His Electoral Highness the Prince Palatine of the Rhine, nephew to his Highness Prince Rupert.
notes: Verse: "Welcome, great prince, to Britains happy isle ..."
Item at A4:1[107] imperfect: stained, affecting title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Karl Ludwig, --  Elector Palatine, 1617-1680 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
